extendedInfo.description: ReLaunch automatically categorises your apps into 9 unique categories and provides an elegant yet simple launcher that can be accessed from anywhere with a single swipe.ReLaunch does not replace your existing home launcher but merely complements it. Works in harmony with home launchers such as ADW Launcher, LauncherPro and Go Launcher EX etc.Features:â Automatic App Categorisation. Using the Google Play Market all your existing apps will be categorised when ReLaunch is installed and new apps are categorised as you download them.â Super Fast Launcher. Access the ReLaunch launcher from anywhere by touching the left or right edge of your screen. With a single swipe move to the category and then the desired app and release to launch.â Manual App Categorisation. Override the automatic categorisation by long-pressing an app icon in the ReLaunch launcher and moving the icon to your preferred category.â ReLaunch Learns. The more apps you launch the more ReLaunch learns your favourite apps and sorts them in the launcher for even faster access. Also supports alphabetical sorting which is the default sort mode.â Multi-touch Support.Launch the launcher with one hand and an app with the other. Perfect for larger screen phones and tablets.â Calibrate. Configure the position of hotspots on the left and right hand side of your screen.â Personalise.  Personalise with colour the launcher categories and text.Known Issues:â Currently, only apps available on the Google Play market can be categorised.Please feel free to contact me with ideas and comments: relaunch@5primes.comTags: relaunch, launcher, 5primes, gesture, swipe, categorise, categorize, sort, automatic, fast

reviews.title: Easy shortcuts
reviews.comment: Nice and innovative.  Highly useful for quick access of all apps.
reviews.author: Manoj Srinivasaiah

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This launcher is just osm and quick and very easy to run and understand... Good job man......Keep it up...
reviews.author: Daanesh Bhathena

reviews.title: Super Speedy
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried nearly a dozen \"edge of screen\" app launchers like this one, and this is the best.  You can quickly find and launch the app you want.  I used to be a diehard swipepad user, but relaunch is so much faster at launching apps.
reviews.author: Todd Pangburn

reviews.title: Lovely hot spot creator
reviews.comment: Awesome....can use with my launcher to give a prefect look to my galaxy.....thanks man
reviews.author: Aatmadeep Aarya

reviews.title: Almost there but still great
reviews.comment: I have tried several different launchers and this is by far my favorite. I keep my phone clean and simple and this helps immensely with that. Would be 5 stars but it doesn\'t stay active all the timeand I have to keep re launching it from my app drawer which I had to add to my HS. Once this is fixed 5 starts alk the way
reviews.author: Brandon Hooper

reviews.title: Awesome Launcher!
reviews.comment: Enjoying this.cool launcher. Great work developer team!
reviews.author: Lynn B

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This is such a amazing app works flawlessly never had any problems so it was worth it to me to get the key for future awesome updates and to support the devs
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very cool app.
reviews.comment: Very cool app. If we could rename categories it would be super cool.
reviews.author: daniall muhammad

reviews.title: very nice
reviews.comment: innovative, cool, easy to use, must give a try
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Geat launcher
reviews.comment: Its simple and user friendly and that\'s why i love it
reviews.author: Azam Fahmy

reviews.title: Great app, very usable.
reviews.comment: This is an excellent app, completely replaced everything on my home screen. Only features I could suggest is an option to offset the position you touch vs the selected element on screen, and option to adjust the opacity of the background effect.  Would be handy to adjust the touch settings so touching just below an item selects it so you can see what your finger is on.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: RAM
reviews.comment: It\'s good, but I only have 512 mb of RAM, and only have 200 mb usable. This app eats 20 mb of my RAM which is so big. So I have to uninstall it.
reviews.author: Giovan Pangku

reviews.title: Nice addition to my minimalistic launcher
reviews.comment: I don\'t like to clutter my launcher with my frequently used app so this is a great feature to use. However, I would really appreciate if I could disable the app from being used outside my launcher. I really don\'t want to accidentally launch a new app from Relauncher when I am typing, playing a game or trying to press whatever button located beneath the \"trigger spot\" of this application.  Besides from that it would be nice to rename the categories, of course.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thanks for the great development.
reviews.comment: I\'m soo thankful to this apps developer,  it made my life much systematic and stylish too.  Great work,  keep it up.  You deserve all five stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Will rate 5 and pay when you can change the name for the category. Really like it but will turn off till its updated :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: It would be very great but it doesnt work on my rooted OT 990 :( Plz fix it, I want this app SO hard!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Snazzy
reviews.comment: Def something new and original! Works pretty decent too but overrides widgetlocker and is accessible even while screen is locked, making it not at all secure. Gotta do something about the memory hogging too!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool Concept
reviews.comment: 2013-05-12 Great idea, works well, fast. Just difficult for me to operate one handed.
reviews.author: David Back

reviews.title: So simple it\'s Great!
reviews.comment: It took a second to get use to but now I can\'t live without it. Works great on my galaxy s 3! Good job guys
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs improvement
reviews.comment: This app does not show up sometimes when touching the hotspot. I need option to rename cartegories. Also, option to set the launcher to just one side will be appreciated.
reviews.author: A Google User
